getAllocation(address).details: calculates and returns the full information about beneficiary's allocation

getLockUnfrozen(uint256).details: calculates how much of given TimeLock-ed amount is unfrozen to the moment. depends on time (is lockClaimTime happened or not).

params.lockAmount: the total amount of Time_Locked tokens

getVestUnfrozen(uint256).details: calculates how much of given Vest-ed amount is unfrozen to the moment. depends on time (is vestStart happened, is vestDurationPassed or how much intervals passed to the moment).

params.vestAmount: the total amount of Vest-ed tokens

release(address).details: called to send unfrozen tokens to the beneficiary.

params.beneficiary: account to whom tokens were allocated*

setAllocations(bytes[]).details: submit multiple records of beneficiaries and their allocations in one transaction

params._allocations: ABI-encoded array of beneficiaries and amounts*
